SqlQuery.Data: SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN tcphdr ON (event.sid = tcphdr.sid AND event.cid = tcphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN udphdr ON (event.sid = udphdr.sid AND event.cid = udphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ( ((exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src AND exclude.port_src = tcphdr.tcp_sport) OR (exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst AND exclude.port_dst = tcphdr.tcp_dport) OR (exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src AND exclude.port_src = udphdr.udp_sport) OR (exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst AND exclude.port_dst = udphdr.udp_dport)) OR (exclude.ip_dst = 0 OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.ip_src = 0 OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.port_src = 0 OR (exclude.port_src = tcphdr.tcp_sport OR exclude.port_src = udphdr.udp_sport)) AND (exclude.port_dst = 0 OR (exclude.port_dst = tcphdr.tcp_dport OR exclude.port_dst = udphdr.udp_dport)) AND (exclude.sig_id = 0 OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature) AND (exclude.ip_proto = iphdr.ip_proto) ) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND event.timestamp < @1 GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_priority DESC, signature.sig_name;
